projects.title: Spotify Stats - Work in progress
projects.description: Currently working on a project that uses the Spotify API to visually display data about a playlist such as genre make up.

projects.title: Personal Portfolio
projects.description: My personal portfolio site built with Eleventy <3

projects.title: The Drug Store Kiosk App
projects.description: Created a react native kiosk app to use in a cashier less beverage store. The app allows customers to scan items with RFID tags and prompt them to use the text based payment service to complete the purchase.

projects.title: Dirty Lemon Vending Machine
projects.description: Created a frontend application for an touch screen vending machine that dispensed Dirty Lemon's beverages. The vending machine launched in Manhattan's Nordstrom. The frontend app integrated with Social Vendâ€™s backend system. Data was posted to the internal API and Dirty Lemon's chat bot system to send/receive text messages from the customer about vended order.

projects.title: Integrating Ml5.js PoseNet model with Three.js
projects.description: This project is a simple demonstration of how to integrate the PoseNet model from ml5.js with Three.js. The PoseNet model is used to detect the pose of a person in a webcam feed, and the detected pose is then used to control the position of a 3D object in a Three.js scene.

projects.title: Codescape
projects.description: Capstone project for Grace Hopper Program Bootcamp. Codescape is an educational game modeled after Codewars and Escape the Room. Your mission is to solve the code problems in order to unlock the clues that will help you escape the room. The game was built with using React and Node.js. It uses docker and websockets to run code challenges safely against test cases.
